title: Midnight Flower Free Watchface
summary: Elegant watch face for Ladies. 2 feminine floral themes. Cute and stylish look.
description: Midnight Flower Free - elegant watch face for ladies. 2 cute and stylish floral themes. Designed for women who love their smart watch and prefer feminine style.Works on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch and otherAndroid Wear devices.Supports round and square displays. Time display: 12/24 hours.  Key features:✔ Date✔ Day of the week.✔ Time format: hh:mm:ss(optional)✔ Watch battery indicator.✔ Phone battery indicator.✔ Weather.✔ Use main theme in ambient mode.You might also like more of floral themes at Lady Summer watch face https://goo.gl/Tm64nHSettings:✔ Select time format (12/24)✔ Seconds on/off✔ Enable/disable the main theme in ambient mode.✔ Select weather update period✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)To install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose  Midnight Flower Free Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme.Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.Common Synchronization problem & solution.If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'- uninstall the watch face- disconnect watch from phone- restart your watch device- reconnect watch and phone- install the Midnight Flower Free watch face once againIn case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star. Contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
descriptionHTML:
Midnight Flower Free - elegant watch face for ladies. 2 cute and stylish floral themes. Designed for women who love their smart watch and prefer feminine style.
Works on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch and otherAndroid Wear devices.
Supports round and square displays.

Time display: 12/24 hours.

Key features:

✔ Date
✔ Day of the week.
✔ Time format: hh:mm:ss(optional)
✔ Watch battery indicator.
✔ Phone battery indicator.
✔ Weather.
✔ Use main theme in ambient mode.

You might also like more of floral themes at Lady Summer watch face https://goo.gl/Tm64nH

Settings:
✔ Select time format (12/24)
✔ Seconds on/off
✔ Enable/disable the main theme in ambient mode.
✔ Select weather update period
✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)


To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Midnight Flower Free Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme.

Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.

Common Synchronization problem & solution.
If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:
- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'
- uninstall the watch face
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart your watch device
- reconnect watch and phone
- install the Midnight Flower Free watch face once again

In case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star. Contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
comments: Really pretty and functional It would be perfect if there was an option for a plain black background,  but other than that it's exactly what I wanted for my moto 360 2 .*edited to add: weather stopped updating, which is disappointing. Dropped review to reflect that.
Nice Almost works perfectly on Samsung Gear Live smartwatch. Only the weather did not sync, everything else is great!
Not working on samsung gear fit ?
